name: Park Tool SBS-1.2 Socket/Bit Set
description: A convenient selection of the most common bits and sockets you’ll need when wrenching a bike. Included 1” socket bit fits various Park Tool freewheel, cassette lockring, and bottom bracket tools.All sockets and bits fit the standard 3/8in. drive.3, 4, 5, 6, 8 and 10mm hex bits.Long-reach 5 and 6mm hex bits.Long-reach T25, T30 and T40 Torx® bits.8, 9, 10, 11, 12, 13, 14, 15mm and 1” socket bits.Durable chromed vanadium steel construction.
